      • putSerializer

        public java.lang.Class<? extends Serializer> putSerializer(java.lang.String name,
                                                  java.lang.Class<? extends Serializer> clazz)
        Puts a new Serializer Class and its associated name into the SerializerFactory.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the Serializer
        clazz - The Class of the Serializer
        Returns:
        The previous Serializer Class associated with the name; null if the name was previously unused.
